sqlMap.select: select b.* from ( select rownum r, notice_no, mem_id, notice_title, notice_content, TO_CHAR(notice_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') notice_regdate, notice_hit from ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE_BOARD) a ) b order by b.r
sqlMap.insert: insert into notice_board (notice_no, mem_id, notice_title, notice_content, notic_regdate, notice_hit) values (#notice_no#, #mem_id#, #notice_title#, sysdate, 0)
